name: glitch-web-app
description: Template web app for deployment on glitch.com

scripts.start_fastapi: python3 -m pip install -qqq . && fastapi dev src/glitch_web_app/fastapi_server.py --host '0.0.0.0' --port '8000' --no-reload
scripts.start: python3 -m pip install -qqq . && fastapi dev src/glitch_web_app/fastapi_server.py --host '0.0.0.0' --port '8000' --no-reload
